alert.note: Alert for Martin; Watonwan (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:02AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Martin and western Watonwan Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 602 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakefield, or 7 miles northwest of Jackson In Jackson County, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Butterfield and St. James. This includes Interstate 90 near mile marker 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for south central Minnesota.
